utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, my eye is a little itchy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhhh, mine too! Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! It's really red! You should go see my eye doctor.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Richard? I'm not gonna go see your ex-boyfriend!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, Richard. That's all I ever hear, Richard, Richard, Richard!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Since we've been going out, I think I've mentioned his name twice!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, so Richard, Richard!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's not Richard! Okay? It's this new guy and he's really good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I'm sorry I'm not going to an eye doctor!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh God, here we go!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Anytime anything comes close to touching her eye or anyone else's she like freaks out. Watch! Watch!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross! Come on! That's all right! Fine--Okay, I have a weird thing about my eye. Can we not talk about it please?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: All right, fine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Rach, remember that great song, Me, Myself, and I?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, does anybody want to get some lunch? All those in favor say I?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross! Stop it! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How much did I love The King and I?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Me too! Me too! Me too!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Just stop it! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You okay there man?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I got too excited!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, I gotta go. I'm taking Ben to the park.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, give him a kiss for me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, bye!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Later!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I am so sorry you got caught in the middle of that. I didn't mean to be so out there. I am furious with him!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow umm, calm down.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm trying, but man that guy can push my buttons!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why are so mad at him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Look, I don't wanna talk about it. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, it just seems that…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You wanna be on my list too? Keep talking! Has anyone seem my list by the way?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, no Pheebs. What's it look like?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh, it's a piece of paper and it says, "Ross" on it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey. I just got off the phone with Estelle and guess what. I GOT THE LEAD IN A MOVIE!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You got the lead in a movie? That's amazing! What's the movie about?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's called Shutter Speed, it's really cool! Yeah, umm, I meet this girl in the subway and we fall in love in like a day, right? And then, she disappears… But I find out where she lives and when I get there this like old lady answers the door and I say, "Where's Betsy?" Right? And she says, "Betsy's been dead for 10 years."

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh-oh, chilling!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And the best part is, we're filming in the desert outside Vegas! And you know what that means buddy!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I know that means buddy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Road trip! Yeah, we can rent a car! I just have to be there by Tuesday!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh wait, my grandmother's dead.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, uh, we can talk about that too Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! No, her cab! She probably won't be using it; you can drive it to Las Vegas.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! Thanks Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-whoa, what are we going to do about my job?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh umm, not go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, great, road trip baby! This okay with you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler! You don't have to ask for my permission. You can go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Rach, come on! We're gonna be late for the eye doctor appointment!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right! Let's get this over with! Ugh! Ohhh! No! Look what I did! Oh, I mean, look at this mess! I mean, we're probably gonna have to clean this up! Y'know? We're gonna have to reschedule!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No. If you thought this mess is going to bother me, you are wrong! All right, let's go Blinky! Chandler!!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh hey Joey! What's up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can't decide which route to take to Vegas. Hey, you've traveled a lot right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I've been around.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, so-so which route should I take the northern route or the southern route?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, if you take the northern route there's a man in Illinois with a beard of bees. {Okay, I must protest this, I've lived in Illinois all my life and know of no man with a beard of bees! Wisconsin, on the other hand, might be a different story.}

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great! Problem solved!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But on the southern route there's a chicken that plays tic-tac-toe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, back to square one.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I know a way that you can decide! All right, I'm going to ask you a series of questions and you answer as quickly as you can.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good, but wait. Okay, all right, here we go. Now I want you to relax. Take a deep breath. Clear your mind. Which do you like better peanut butter or egg whites?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Peanut butter!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Which would you rather be a fireman or a swimmer?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A swimmer!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who would you rather sleep with Monica or Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Monica. Oh… huh, I always thought it would be Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No thinking! No thinking! Tie or ascot?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ascot!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: North route or south route?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: North route!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bamn! There you go! Huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! That was incredible! Beard of bees, here I come!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, this guy again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey man, what's up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uhh, not much. You guys want to see a movie tonight?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure, what do you want to see?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't know, umm…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I know how we can decide. Phoebe, show him your game!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, no thank you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What's with her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know. But hey, I know we can decide. Okay, I'm gonna ask you questions and you answer real quick. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What do you like better action or comedy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Action.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who would you rather sleep with Monica or Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, you are sick.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry. I forgot you had that whole Rachel thing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! What does that thing do?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that's an eye removal machine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, I'm outta here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm kidding! I'm kidding!

utterance.speaker: The Doctor
utterance.content: Hi Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: The Doctor
utterance.content: I'm Dr. Miller. Monica told me you were a little nervous, but don't worry everything's gonna be just fine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So were done then!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: Almost! But first, we gotta start.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: This is a glaucoma test.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: Sit down.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: But your chin here. Now, you'll feel a small puff of air in each eye.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: A small puff of air, now come on!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: Here we go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm sorry. All right, I'll just stay in here this time. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: Ready?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know what, I'm gonna hold her head.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: That's okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: 1…2! Y'know what? You're young; you probably don't have glaucoma.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Great!! It was very, very nice to meet you sir--Ow! Hey! What are you doing?! Are you crazy!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: Okay. You've got a small, minor infection in that left eye. I want you to take these drops three times a day and you'll be as good as new.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, no, I don't-I don't put things in my eye.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: Okay then, I guess we'll see you back here in three months.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: And I'll fit you for a glass eye.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, just give me the damn drops!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Dr. Miller? P E C F D.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Miller
utterance.content: Very good Monica! You know where they are.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I sure do! And you don't get one!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know, I-I gotta tell ya, those eye drops are a miracle. My eye is a 100% better.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They're still in my coat.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Damn!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! You ready to go?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, listen, how cold is it going to be there? Do I need a coat or will all these sweater vests be enough?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I love you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, I wish Ross was coming with us! Y'know? I'm gonna miss him!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thanks a lot! I just got that jerk out of my mind!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, so where are we staying? Is the movie putting us up in a big hotel suite?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh no, not really. It's an independent film y'know? So we don't have a real big budget. I figured I'd just stay in your room.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I see, but once you get your first paycheck you'll be springing a big hotel suite, right? I mean, lead in a movie, they must be paying you a lot?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah! For every dollar Shutter Speed makes, one penny of it goes right in Joey's pocket.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you don't get paid unless the movie makes money?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Did you not hear the plot of the movie? "She's been dead for ten years." I'm gonna be a millionaire!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just wanna say good-bye to you guys and to see if you guys will place a little bet for me, huh? Twenty bucks on black 15.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You got it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, bye-bye now!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Bye you guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Bye-bye!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I wanna say good-bye at the car!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Anybody want to say good-bye to me at the car?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh honey, I'll say good-bye to you at the car if you don't mind the puss.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: See ya!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, wait a minute! The puss is good! It means it's healing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs, what 'cha reading? Pheebs? Hello? Phoebe? Phoe-Phoebe! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't see you there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe, are you, are you mad at me, or something? 'Cause if are please, tell me what it is I did!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, if you don't know I can't help you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I can't help you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, whatever it is I'm-I'm very, very sorry. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Apology accepted.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. So we're, we're good?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right. I'll uh, I'll see you later, okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bye, fat ass.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ALL RIGHT!! Phoebe now come on! Will you please tell me what it is I did that mad you so mad at me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don't know! I don't remember!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well if you can't remember, can't we just forget about this?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, I am mad at you. I know that much. But, I am sorry about the fat ass thing. You actually have a very sweet little hiney.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, I'm getting pretty tired. You're might have to take over soon.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We've been driving for a half-hour, and you haven't looked at the road once.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't worry, it's out there! I think I just need lunch.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You wanna eat? My treat!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Isn't that Ross's money?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Okay. Ross's treat! Where do you wanna eat?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh, hey, I know how we can decide! All right, uh, I'm gonna ask you a bunch of questions and then you have to answer real fast. Okay? So uh, clear your mind Clear it right out! Clear it out! Clear!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, uhh, would you rather be too wet or too dry?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Too dry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Do you believe in ghosts, yes or no?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is this movie gonna be my big break?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude you said, "No!"

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I also said, "Yes!"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You don't think this is going to be a big break for me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! Ahhh!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't believe this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look Joe, I just, I just don't want to get your hopes up real high.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you talking about?! I'm the lead in a movie!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They're not even paying ya! This doesn't even sound like a real movie!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y'know what? I don't need this! Okay? I don't know why you're dumping all over my big break.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joe, I don't think this is going to be your big break.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is that why you're on this trip, huh? Make me feel like a loser? 'Cause if it is, I'll tell ya, I-I-I'd rather be alone.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, you don't want me on the trip?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not if you're gonna be like this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, I'll tell ya what, the next time you ask me a question like that I'll lie.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! I don't want you on the trip!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, fine! Fine! Why don't you pull over? I'll get out right now!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fine! Get out!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're not actually supposed to stop on the bridge.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Get out!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right!! Wait! Wait, there's no sidewalk! Yeah, I'm gonna die here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, are you mad at me because my hair gel smells?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you angry at me because I said your handwriting is childlike?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No that made me feel precious.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I know! Umm, is it because he's always correcting people's grammar? Whom! Whom! Sometimes it's who!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? Sometimes it's…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, did you beat him at a board game? He turns into such a baby when he starts to lose.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I'm the baby.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Eh! Stop it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler! What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey kicked me out of the car on the George Washington bridge!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Why?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know! He went crazy! Y'know, we were playing that game where you-you ask a question and you answer it really fast.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That game should not be played without my supervision.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I don't know what mad him so mad, y'know? All I said was that uh, I didn't think this wasn't gonna be his big break, that this movie wasn't going to do anything for him, and that uh, y'know it didn't sound like a real movie--Okay, he should've pushed me off of the bridge.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What's in the bag?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I figured you guys would all be mad at me. So I got you some gifts that I found on the side of the road. Who wants the teddy bear with one leg?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I do!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Not even close.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, then y'know what? Help me! I need help! I can't do this!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay! All right! Let's do it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sit down.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Put your head back.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Now, open your eyes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, they are.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How many fingers am I holding up?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Four.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, I was thinking four.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes! All right, y'know what? Why don't we start with a practice run? Okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No drops!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: On three, 1…2…3! Now my pillow's all wet!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, well, you said it was practice!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Then why did you move?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because I knew you were lying!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, come here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you? Monica!! Stop it!! Oh my God! Stop it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I am going… I'm going--Turn it over! I'm… I am going to get these drops in your eyes.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! You really are freakishly strong!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica! Stop it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Damn! It's empty!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow, y'know if Joey and Chandler walked in right now, we could make a fortune!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh that is definitely Chandler, Joey, or Ross. Or-or Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello? It's Joey. I'm so glad you called! Chandler told me what happened. Y'know he's really upset about it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not as upset as he's gonna be when he finds out what I did with his sweater vests!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What did you do to his sweater vests?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Let's just say there's a well-dressed pack of dogs in Ohio. Hey Monica listen is-is Phoebe there? I gotta ask her something about the car.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, she's here. Hold on a second.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, dude!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs! Listen, this wooden box keeps sliding out from under the seat. What-what is it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh that's my grandma. And thanks Joey she's having a really great time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that Joey? Is that Joey? Let me talk to him! I wanna talk to him!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay Joey? Chandler's here, he was wondering… Okay, I guess he ran out of change.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, he won't even talk to me. How am I going to apologize to him if he won't even talk to me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, maybe you should send him something. So that when he gets to Las Vegas he'll know that you're sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's a good idea. I wonder where I could get a basket of porn…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, don't-don't say I'm sorry with porn!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y'know what you should send him? A cartoon of cigarettes. 'Cause that why he could trade it for protection. No. That's prison.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay Pheebs, I know how we're going to figure this out. Okay, clear your mind and answer the first thing that comes into your head. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What do you like better flora or fauna?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Fauna.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who would you rather be Simon or Garfunkle?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Garfunkle.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why are you mad at me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You said I was boring--Ohh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: When did I say you were boring?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, I remember now! We were playing chess!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe! You and I have never played chess!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, come on! Yes, remember that time on the frozen lake? We were playing chess, you said I was boring, and then you took off your energy mask and you were Cameron Diaz! Okay, there's a chance this may have been a dream.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey! Stanley! Hey-hey! You're leading man is here! Let's get to work.

utterance.speaker: Stanley
utterance.content: Umm, slight change of plans. We've shut down.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wh-what?! Why?!

utterance.speaker: Stanley
utterance.content: It's a money thing, we don't have any.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're kidding right?

utterance.speaker: Stanley
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Stanley
utterance.content: It-it's probably just temporary. We're hoping to get some more money soon, so if could just uh, hang out.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, hang out?! How long?

utterance.speaker: Stanley
utterance.content: I don't know. A week? Maybe two? The money will turn up! People will always wanna invest in movies! Hey, you're not rich are ya?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Stanley
utterance.content: Eh, worth a shot. Look Joey, let me know where you're staying, okay?

utterance.speaker: The Grip
utterance.content: Hey pal, are you Joey Tribbiani?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: The Grip
utterance.content: These got left for ya.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks. Congratulations on your big break.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Monica, it's Joey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Joey! Aww, you remembered even though you're a big star!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aw, come on! It'll be years before I forget you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, what's it like on a movie set, huh? Do you have a dressing room? Do you have a chair with your name on it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, well yeah-yeah, I've got all of that going on. Yeah, listen uh, I want you to make sure you tell Chandler that he couldn't have been more wrong! Uh-oh! I gotta go Monica, my uh, my sushi's here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sorry about that. Thanks for waitin'.

utterance.speaker: The Husband
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Everybody smile! Okay, thanks a lot! Enjoy your stay at Caesar's! We hope it's toga-rrific! Kill me. Kill me now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Rach, can you pass me the TV Guide?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yep!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Go!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!! Stop it! Stop it! Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! Okay! We'll see you in about 3 to 4 hours.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!
